text: Rwose Allah yamaze kwakira ukwicuza k'Umuhanuzi (Muhamadi), n’abimukira (bavuye i Maka bajya i Madina) ndetse n’abaturage b’i Madina (babakiriye), na babandi bakurikiye (Intumwa Muhamadi) mu bihe bigoye (urugamba rwa Tabuki), nyuma y’uko imitima ya bamwe muri bo yari hafi kudohoka ku kuri, maze yakira ukwicuza kwabo. Mu by'ukuri, we ni Nyiribambe, Nyirimbabazi kuri bo
